In first visit , various anthropometric data collect participant , height , weight , waist hip circumference . The participant ' blood pressure also check hypertension . The participant give Dual Energy X-Ray Absorptiometry ( DEXA ) scan determine total body composition ( bone , fat , fat-free mass ) If participant female , urine analysis determine pregnancy require visit DEXA ensure safety . Participants give Rapid Assessment Physical Activity ( RAPA ) questionnaire assess habitual activity level . The participant ' muscle strength also measure use Biodex System 3 , isokinetic dynamometer . The participant undergo maximal stress test treadmill integrate Cardinal Health Metabolic/ECG cart use modify Balke protocol , begin 3 mph , 0 % grade , increase 2.5 % grade every 3 minute . The ECG component metabolic cart use continuous heart rate monitor part fitness assessment . Cardiorespiratory parameter ( VO2 , ventilation , respiratory rate ) also measure throughout test . In second visit , participant first give series cognitive test design quantify cognitive faculty visual short-term memory , selective attention , process speed , verbal fluency . These test consist see simple image computer screen , series color shape , respond use keypad . A blood sample also collect participant serve baseline . The subject randomize one three group : first group rest 30 minute ; second group walk treadmill mild intensity , define maintain 60 % heart rate observe max VO2 first visit ; last group walk treadmill hard intensity , define maintain 80 % heart rate observe max VO2 first visit . The subject undergo second blood draw cooling , follow immediately another round cognitive test .
